text: John Henry Maund (5 January 1916 – 1994) was an English footballer who played as a Right winger for Hednesford Town, Aston Villa, Nottingham Forest, and Walsall. ==Playing career== Maund played for Hednesford Town, Aston Villa, and Nottingham Forest. During World War II he played as a guest for Notts County, Walsall, Northampton Town, and Port Vale.
